title: Tata Power DDL says TQM practices helped improve electricity supply reliability by 70%
description: Tata Power Delhi Distribution Ltd has significantly improved electricity supply reliability by 70% over the past five years through total quality management practices. These efforts also reduced aggregate technical and commercial losses by 30%, earning the company the prestigious Deming Prize for operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
